entry.title: First post!
entry.content:
My name is Michael Thelen and I run Boshvark Software, LLC. We specialize in developing apps for iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad. We also provide consulting services and application development for Mac OS X, Linux, and Windows. Our most popular application is Zyzzyva, a cross-platform word study program used by top Scrabble® players around the world.

And by we, I mean me. Yeah, pretty much just me. I am also employed as a full-time software developer. I enjoy a good challenge and love learning new things, and I especially enjoy sharing what I’ve learned.

I’m excited to use this blog to discuss programming, consulting, productivity, small business, or whatever topics I find interesting in the world of computers and technology. I hope you enjoy it too.
